ing: 1 fresh peach - peeled, pitted and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "I invented this quick and easy salad to keep lunch cool in summertime. Avocado, fresh fruit, and sweet onion with lime juice just seemed natural!"
ins: Mix together the avocado, peach, and onion in a bowl. Pour the lime juice over the mixture and season with salt and pepper. Toss the mixture until evenly coated.
